nodes.text: Virgillia was an astronomical object located in the Virgillia system of the Outer Rim Territories, positioned at the coordinates I-18 on the Standard Galactic Grid.

Virgillia was first mentioned in Star Wars: The Force Awakens Beginner Game, published by Fantasy Flight Games in 2016. In the Star Wars Legends continuity, Virgillia 7 was a planet, first mentioned in The Truce at Bakura Sourcebook, written by Kathy Tyers and Eric S. Trautmann, and published in 1996.
